        'use strict';

        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
            // --- STATE & CONSTANTS ---

            let animationDirection = 1;

                    lines: { cos: document.getElementById('svg-line-cos'), sin: document.getElementById('svg-line-sin'), tanSinh: document.getElementById('svg-line-tan-sinh'), secCosh: document.getElementById('svg-line-sec-cosh') },
                    points: { circle: document.getElementById('svg-point-circle'), tangent: document.getElementById('svg-point-tangent'), hyperbola: document.getElementById('svg-point-hyperbola') },

            // --- UTILITY FUNCTIONS ---

            const setAttr = (el, attrs) => Object.entries(attrs).forEach(([key, value]) => el.setAttribute(key, String(value)));
            const clamp = (num, min, max) => Math.min(Math.max(num, min), max);
            const sleep = ms => new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, ms));

            // --- CORE LOGIC ---
            function updateAll(degrees, source = 'internal') {
                const angleDegrees = clamp(parseFloat(degrees) || 0, -ASYMPTOTE_THRESHOLD, ASYMPTOTE_THRESHOLD);
                const angleStr = angleDegrees.toFixed(1);

                if (dom.slider.value !== angleStr) dom.slider.value = angleStr;
                if (dom.angleInput.value !== angleStr) dom.angleInput.value = angleStr;

                updateVisualization(angleDegrees);
                if (source === 'user' || source === 'drag') triggerPulse();
                if ((source === 'user' || source === 'drag-end') && !isPlaying) updateURLHash(angleDegrees);
            }
            
            function updateVisualization(angleDegrees) {
                const angleAbs = Math.abs(angleDegrees);
                dom.svg.classList.toggle('is-near-asymptote', angleAbs > FADE_START_ANGLE);

                const theta = angleDegrees * DEG_TO_RAD;
                const cos_t = Math.cos(theta);
                const sin_t = Math.sin(theta);
                
                const isAtAsymptote = angleAbs >= ASYMPTOTE_THRESHOLD;
                const tan_t = isAtAsymptote ? Infinity * Math.sign(angleDegrees || 1) : Math.tan(theta);
                const sec_t = isAtAsymptote ? Infinity : 1 / cos_t;
                
                const p = Math.asinh(tan_t);
                const cosh_p = Math.cosh(p);
                const sinh_p = Math.sinh(p);

                dom.slider.setAttribute('aria-valuetext', `${angleDegrees.toFixed(1)} degrees`);
                dom.data.p.textContent = format(p); dom.data.sec.textContent = format(sec_t);
                dom.data.tan.textContent = format(tan_t); dom.data.cos.textContent = format(cos_t);
                dom.data.sin.textContent = format(sin_t); dom.data.cosh.textContent = format(cosh_p);
                dom.data.sinh.textContent = format(sinh_p); dom.data.areaCircular.textContent = format(Math.abs(theta / 2));
                dom.data.areaHyperbolic.textContent = format(Math.abs(p / 2));
                
                const points = {

                    P_tan_tip: { x: 1, y: -tan_t }, P_hyperbola: { x: sec_t, y: -tan_t }, P_sec_axis: { x: sec_t, y: 0 }
                };
                dom.svg.dataset.currentPoints = JSON.stringify(points);

                setAttr(dom.svgElements.points.circle, { cx: points.P_circle.x, cy: points.P_circle.y });
                setAttr(dom.svgElements.lines.cos, { x1: points.P_origin.x, y1: points.P_origin.y, x2: points.P_cos_axis.x, y2: points.P_cos_axis.y });
                setAttr(dom.svgElements.lines.sin, { x1: points.P_cos_axis.x, y1: points.P_cos_axis.y, x2: points.P_circle.x, y2: points.P_circle.y });
                
                const sweepFlag = angleDegrees >= 0 ? 0 : 1;
                dom.svgElements.arcTheta.setAttribute('d', `M 1 0 A 1 1 0 0 ${sweepFlag} ${points.P_circle.x} ${points.P_circle.y} L 0 0 Z`);
                
                if (isFinite(sec_t) && isFinite(tan_t)) {
                    setAttr(dom.svgElements.points.tangent, { cx: points.P_tan_tip.x, cy: points.P_tan_tip.y });
                    setAttr(dom.svgElements.points.hyperbola, { cx: points.P_hyperbola.x, cy: points.P_hyperbola.y });
                    setAttr(dom.svgElements.guidelines.radial, { x1: points.P_origin.x, y1: points.P_origin.y, x2: points.P_hyperbola.x, y2: points.P_hyperbola.y });
                    setAttr(dom.svgElements.guidelines.tan, { x1: points.P_tan_axis.x, y1: points.P_tan_axis.y, x2: points.P_tan_tip.x, y2: points.P_tan_tip.y });
                    setAttr(dom.svgElements.guidelines.hyperbola, { x1: points.P_circle.x, y1: points.P_circle.y, x2: points.P_hyperbola.x, y2: points.P_hyperbola.y });
                    setAttr(dom.svgElements.lines.tanSinh, { x1: points.P_sec_axis.x, y1: points.P_sec_axis.y, x2: points.P_hyperbola.x, y2: points.P_hyperbola.y });
                    setAttr(dom.svgElements.lines.secCosh, { x1: points.P_origin.x, y1: points.P_origin.y, x2: points.P_sec_axis.x, y2: points.P_sec_axis.y });
                }
                
                if (isFinite(p) && p !== 0) {
                    let hyperbolicAreaPath = 'M 0 0 L 1 0 ';
                    const steps = 60;
                    for (let i = 1; i <= steps; i++) {
                        const p_step = p * (i / steps);
                        hyperbolicAreaPath += `L ${Math.cosh(p_step)} ${-Math.sinh(p_step)} `;
                    }
                    hyperbolicAreaPath += 'Z';
                    dom.svgElements.areaHyperbolic.setAttribute('d', hyperbolicAreaPath);
                } else {
                    dom.svgElements.areaHyperbolic.setAttribute('d', '');
                }
                
                updateLabelPositions(theta, cos_t, sin_t, points);
                updateProjectionPaths(points);
            }
            
            function updateLabelPositions(theta, cos_t, sin_t, points) {
                const ySign = Math.sign(theta) || 1;
                const isNearHorizontal = Math.abs(sin_t) < 0.15;

                setAttr(dom.svgElements.labels.theta, { x: 0.4 * Math.cos(theta / 2), y: -0.4 * Math.sin(theta / 2) });
                setAttr(dom.svgElements.labels.cos, { x: points.P_cos_axis.x / 2, y: ySign * 0.15 });
                setAttr(dom.svgElements.labels.sin, { x: points.P_circle.x + Math.sign(cos_t || 1) * 0.12, y: points.P_circle.y / 2, 'text-anchor': cos_t < 0 ? 'end' : 'start'});
                
                if (isFinite(points.P_sec_axis.x)) {
                    const secCoshYOffset = isNearHorizontal ? ySign * -0.25 : -0.15;
                    setAttr(dom.svgElements.labels.secCosh, { x: points.P_sec_axis.x / 2, y: secCoshYOffset });
                    setAttr(dom.svgElements.labels.tanSinh, { x: points.P_hyperbola.x + (cos_t > 0 ? 0.12 : -0.12), y: points.P_hyperbola.y / 2, 'text-anchor': cos_t > 0 ? 'start' : 'end'});
                    setAttr(dom.svgElements.labels.projSec, { x: points.P_sec_axis.x / 2, y: secCoshYOffset - 0.15 });
                    setAttr(dom.svgElements.labels.projTan, { x: points.P_hyperbola.x + (cos_t > 0 ? 0.15 : -0.15), y: points.P_hyperbola.y / 2, 'text-anchor': cos_t > 0 ? 'start' : 'end' });
                }
            }
            
            function updateProjectionPaths(points) {
                if (!isFinite(points.P_hyperbola.x) || !isFinite(points.P_hyperbola.y)) return;
                const { P_origin, P_tan_tip, P_hyperbola } = points;
                const { radial, horizontal } = dom.svgElements.projections;

                const radialPath = `M ${P_origin.x} ${P_origin.y} L ${P_tan_tip.x} ${P_tan_tip.y}`;
                const radialLength = Math.hypot(P_tan_tip.x - P_origin.x, P_tan_tip.y - P_origin.y);
                setAttr(radial, { d: radialPath, 'stroke-dasharray': radialLength, 'stroke-dashoffset': radialLength });
                
                const horizontalPath = `M ${P_tan_tip.x} ${P_tan_tip.y} L ${P_hyperbola.x} ${P_hyperbola.y}`;
                const horizontalLength = Math.abs(P_hyperbola.x - P_tan_tip.x);
                setAttr(horizontal, { d: horizontalPath, 'stroke-dasharray': horizontalLength, 'stroke-dashoffset': horizontalLength });
            }

            function triggerPulse() {
                const elementsToPulse = [
                    {el: dom.svgElements.lines.secCosh, class: 'pulse-anim-svg'}, {el: dom.svgElements.lines.tanSinh, class: 'pulse-anim-svg'},
                    {el: dom.data.sec, class: 'pulse-anim-data'}, {el: dom.data.cosh, class: 'pulse-anim-data'},
                    {el: dom.data.tan, class: 'pulse-anim-data'}, {el: dom.data.sinh, class: 'pulse-anim-data'},

                elementsToPulse.forEach(item => {
                    item.el.classList.remove(item.class);
                    void item.el.offsetWidth;
                    item.el.classList.add(item.class);

                    animationDirection *= -1;

                const speed = parseFloat(dom.speedSlider.value);
                const newVal = currentVal + (speed * animationDirection);

                const touch = evt.touches ? evt.touches[0] : evt;
                svgPoint.x = touch.clientX;

                const transformedPoint = svgPoint.matrixTransform(dom.svg.getScreenCTM().inverse());
                return { x: transformedPoint.x, y: -transformedPoint.y };
            }

                const targetId = e.target.id;
                const isPointInteraction = targetId === 'svg-point-circle' || targetId === 'svg-point-hyperbola';
